sourcesContent:
Companies

  • {{company.id}} - {{company.name}}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Company} from "./Models"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ title = 'hh-front'; companies: Company[] = []; ngOnInit(){ this.companies.push( {id: 1, name: "Kolesa.kz", description: "lorem10", city: "Almaty", address: "Tole Bi 65"}, {id: 1, name: "Kaspi.kz", description: "lorem11", city: "Astana", address: "Tauke Khan 23"}, {id: 1, name: "Technodom", description: "lorem12", city: "Shymkent", address: "Abay 45"} ) } }
